Title: Boku, Otaryman.
Description: ["Boku, Otary-man (otaku + salaryman) is a autobiographical manga of the author Yoshitani, who is also working as a system engineer. It's about a slice of life of an office worker, who is a little bit otaku."]
Related: ['Adaptation: Captain', 'Sequel: Play Ball', 'Parent story: Captain Movie', 'Alternative version: Captain']
Staff: [['Ashina, Minoru', 'Director, Sound Director, Script'], ['Takehara, Minoru', 'Animation Director'], ['Yoshitani', 'Original Creator']]
